children.text:
Now, variable declarations: Let's structure the program. PROGRAM main
IMPLICIT NONE
INTEGER(8) :: cnt(5), res
INTEGER :: n, i
CHARACTER(LEN=10) :: str
CHARACTER(LEN=1) :: first_char

! Read n
READ*, n
cnt = 0
DO i=1, n
   READ(*,'(A)') str
   first_char = str(1:1) SELECT CASE( first_char )
      CASE ('M')
         cnt(1) = cnt(1)+1
      CASE ('A')
         cnt(2)=cnt(2)+1
      CASE ('R')
         cnt(3)=cnt(3)+1
      CASE ('C')
         cnt(4) = cnt(4)+1
      CASE ('H')
         cnt(5) = cnt(5)+1
      CASE DEFAULT
         ! Do nothing
   END SELECT
END DO

res = cnt(1)*cnt(2)*cnt(3) + cnt(1)*cnt(2)*cnt(4) + cnt(1)*cnt(2)*cnt(5) + cnt(1)*cnt(3)*cnt(4) + cnt(1)*cnt(3)*cnt(5) + cnt(1)*cnt(4)*cnt(5) + cnt(2)*cnt(3)*cnt(4) + cnt(2)*cnt(3)*cnt(5) + cnt(2)*cnt(4)*cnt(5) + cnt(3)*cnt(4)*cnt(5)

WRITE(*,*) res

END PROGRAM main

PROGRAM main
IMPLICIT NONE
INTEGER(8) :: cnt(5), res
INTEGER :: n, i
CHARACTER(LEN=10) :: str
CHARACTER(LEN=1) :: first_char

   first_char = str(1:1)

      CASE ('M')
         cnt(1) = cnt(1)+1
      CASE ('A')
         cnt(2)=cnt(2)+1
      CASE ('R')
         cnt(3)=cnt(3)+1
      CASE ('C')
         cnt(4) = cnt(4)+1
      CASE ('H')
         cnt(5) = cnt(5)+1
      CASE DEFAULT
         ! Do nothing
   END SELECT
END DO

res = cnt(1)*cnt(2)*cnt(3) + cnt(1)*cnt(2)*cnt(4) + cnt(1)*cnt(2)*cnt(5) + cnt(1)*cnt(3)*cnt(4) + cnt(1)*cnt(3)*cnt(5) + cnt(1)*cnt(4)*cnt(5) + cnt(2)*cnt(3)*cnt(4) + cnt(2)*cnt(3)*cnt(5) + cnt(2)*cnt(4)*cnt(5) + cnt(3)*cnt(4)*cnt(5)

WRITE(*,*) res

END PROGRAM main
